blurElysiumSettings.label: Elysium Slider
blurElysiumSettings.breakpointsDescription:
Elysium Slider, Banner und Slides verwenden Geräteeinstellungen für die Smartphone, Tablet und Desktop Ansicht. Du kannst die Gerätegrößen, welche im Theme verwendet werden sollen, selbst definieren.
Hierbei werden die Breakpoints des Shopware Themes genutzt. In der unteren Auswahl werden die Standard Pixelwerte des Shopware Themes angezeigt. Diese können je nach verwendeten Theme oder Individualentwicklungen abweichen.

containerWidth.label: Content Container width
containerWidth.helpText: Define the content container width. On Page Content the maximum width of the container follows the paqe content width. On Full width the content container is in full width

aspectRatio.label: Aspect ratio
aspectRatio.description: Defines the aspect ratio and therefore the size of the slider. The height can be limited to a maximum value.

emptyViewport.title: Select viewport
emptyViewport.description: Please choose a viewport size first

preview.defaultDescriptionValue: Wähle in den Element Einstellungen einen oder mehrere Slides und lege weitere Slider Einstellungen fest.
Wähle in den Element Einstellungen einen Slide, sowie weitere Banner Einstellungen.

messages.deleteSlideConfirmDialogue: Do you want to delete the slide permanently? This action cannot be undone
messages.deleteNamedSlideConfirmDialogue: Do you want to delete the slide {name} permanently? This action cannot be undone
messages.copyErrorUnsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. Save or discard these changes so that you can duplicate the slide

custom.label: URL
custom.helpText: Set the linking of the slide. This can be both an absolute and a relative URL.

label.label: Button label
label.placeholder: Enter a Button Label for your Slide
label.helpText: Set the label of the button. If no label is provided no button will be display.

appearance.label: Button Appearance
appearance.helpText: Sets the appearance of the button. The colors are based on the theme settings.

overlay.label: Link Overlay
overlay.helpText: When the overlay option is active, the entire slide is used as linking area. In this case the Button is hidden.

message.noSlides: Seems you haven't any Slides yet. Head over to the Elysium Slides Module and create some.

list.label: Slide selection
list.helptext: Click in the search field and select your slide collection. You will find your slides under Contents › Elysium Slides, where you can also create new slides.

slideLabel.label: Slide name
slideLabel.helpText: Set a name for the slide. This name will only be used to identify the slide

headline.title: Headline
headline.label: Content
headline.helpText: Set a heading for the slide. You can use the HTML tags br, i, u, b, strong and span.

element.label: HTML Element
element.helpText: Specify an HTML element for your heading. If no element is selected, a div element is used

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Enter a Description for your Slide
description.helpText: Set a short description text for the slide. This will be displayed under the headline.

cssClass.label: CSS Class
cssClass.helpText: Set one or more CSS classes, separated by a space, for the slide.

customTemplate.cardDescription: Here you can define your own Twig template file for this slide. If you have entered a Twig template file in this field, you must store it manually in your theme.
customTemplate.customTemplatePath:
The path to this file is:
/storefront/component/blur-elysium-slide/custom/{file}.html.twig
customTemplate.hasCustomNotice: Notice: This slide has its own Twig template file defined. Please note this when managing the slide.

slideCoverImage.title: Cover image
slideCoverImage.description:
Adds an image as slide background. The cover image can be defined for mobile, tablet and desktop viewport. The desktop image serves as default.
Valid image formats are jpg, png, webp, svg, avif

slideCoverVideo.title: Cover video
slideCoverVideo.description:
Adds a video as slide background. The set cover video applies to all views.
Valid video formats are mp4

presentationMedia.label: Focus image
presentationMedia.description: The focus image is displayed as a separate image next to the content area.

slideAppearance.title: Slide area
slideAppearance.description: Determines the spacing and edge rounding of the slide. These settings are device-dependent.

justifyContent.helpText: This setting only has a visible effect if the maximum width of the container element is active

containerAlignment.title: Container alignment
containerAlignment.description: Determines the alignment of the inner slide container element. These settings are device-dependent.

containerElementAppearance.title: Container element appearance
containerElementAppearance.description: These display settings relate to the container element and are device-dependent. The container element contains the content and image element

columnWrap.label: Display elements one below the other
columnWrap.helpText: Breaks all container elements and displays them below each other instead of next to each other.

order.label: Layout order
order.helpText: Defines the order of the container elements

justifyContent.helpText: This setting only has a visible effect if the maximum width of the content or image element is active

contentElementAppearance.title: Content element appearance
contentElementAppearance.description: These display settings relate to the content element and are device-dependent. The content element contains the heading, description and button.

imageElementAppearance.title: Image element appearance
imageElementAppearance.description: These display settings relate to the picture element and are device-dependent. The picture element contains the focus picture.
